DataElement.preferredName: Person Surgical Procedure Clinical Trial Registration 2 Digit Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the two digit value to capture whether a surgical procedure, to remove or repair a part of the body or to find out whether disease is present, has been performed for a person enrolling or registering to participate on a clinical trial, a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Surgical Procedure Clinical Trial Registration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the surgical procedure, to remove or repair a part of the body or to find out whether disease is present, of a person enrolling or registering to participate on a clinical trial, a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.

Property.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.:A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.:The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.
The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the two digit numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is the patient being entered
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient being entered pre- or post-surgery

DataElement.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
